https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gxzNvCMMXCyb9u6eQZ9l8sUodjU.jpg When Kayleigh, a romance writer, has her column cancelled right before Christmas, she heads home to reconnect with her family. Kayleigh gets an unexpected visit from the man who cancelled her column who fights not only to bring her back to the publisher but also for her heart. Christmas She Wrote
